block.p: Even before the Iraqi prime minister, Nuri Kamal al-Maliki, signed the death warrant for Saddam Hussein, Iraqi and American officials feuded over the execution and now they offer competing versions of what happened in the final days.
Report on Iraqi Deaths An American report on the killing of 24 Iraqis in 2005 supports prosecutors' allegations that marines illegally killed civilians, officials say.

Even before the Iraqi prime minister, Nuri Kamal al-Maliki, signed the death warrant for Saddam Hussein, Iraqi and American officials feuded over the execution and now they offer competing versions of what happened in the final days.
Report on Iraqi Deaths An American report on the killing of 24 Iraqis in 2005 supports prosecutors' allegations that marines illegally killed civilians, officials say.
